text_block_list.text: The next day, I had a surprising encounter with Air Groove. I found her after following the irritated voice coming from the hallway一
Air Groove's Trainer:Why?! I'm Air Groove's trainer! So just listen to what I'm saying…!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Tracen Academy values student independence. A wide range of student council activities are part of that.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: But, if she continues in her student council activities and guiding her juniors, it's her own growth that'll be affected! So一

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Air Groove takes part in those with a clear will and purpose. No one should be able to deprive her of that without her consent.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Is Air Groove aware of this "resigning from the student council to focus on training" rule you speak of?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Th-that's…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: 一No, I don't particularly have any memory of it.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Air Groove…!…Why are you here?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: President, I apologize for getting you involved in this. I'll take it from here.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Is that so? Then I'll take my leave here. Well… don't be too hard on her, Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …I'll try my best.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Now then, you've been rather selfish haven't you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Wait, please listen to what I'm saying! I just didn't want you to waste your time…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: "Waste", huh… Just from that sentence, there's no room for further argument.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: What… why?! If you want to leave good results then you should cut out unnecessary activities!!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Leave good results… if that's all you were thinking about, then that means our viewpoints were different.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That's all. The supervisor contract is now terminated. Now then, excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Good grief… it happened again, huh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Well, I don't think there are many trainers that can match up to her standards but一

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wait, you're looking at Air Groove again? None of you ever seem to learn.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hm? But wait this might actually be a big chance for you, huh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hey you, if you tried it now wouldn't you be able to scout Air Groove?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Well, as you can see she's a rather blunt "Empress" so be sure you're re- Wait, he left already.
So I could scout Air Groove, I chased her until she reached a tree lined road. And then一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Good grief… is a trainer of that level really the best Tracen has to offer?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: At this rate, something like a trusted partner seems一
choice_data_list: Air Groove, I'm here to scout you!
Air Groove, I'm here to scout you!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ha…? Who are you?! Appearing out of nowhere like that, how uncouth!
Her face was terrifying so I properly introduced myself before politely explaining I wanted to scout her…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hmph. I can tell you're persistent, but I'm already getting tired of wasting my time on trainers.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I've no intention of teaming up with some rookie trai一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: No, wait.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Tomorrow, I'll be doing strength training in the school gym. I'll allow you to decide the regimen there.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: First, show me your abilities as a trainer. Then we'll talk.
I spent the entire night desperately devising a plan that would make Air Groove recognize me.
Then, the next day…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm. It seems up to par. Looks like you'll at least be able to carry out training without issue.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Then, the contract will go as so. As my trainer, you will only concern yourself with duties related to my training.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Involving yourself with anything other than training, that is my time spent on student council activities. Will not be forgiven.
choice_data_list: So, you'll let me scout you!?
So, you'll let me scout you!?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Yes. But don't even dream of forgetting the contract conditions. Now then…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I am "The Empress" Air Groove. I hold this title so that I can be an ideal and compass for all horse girls.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Of course in races too, I must uphold the meaning of this title. Leaving only victory and results worthy of admiration, is my duty.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: For that purpose, you also need to make sure you fulfill your role as trainer. Understood?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: What an unreliable answer… hmph. Well, whatever.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I don't intend on relying on you anyways…
Thus, although there was a hint of turmoil, my days of supervising Air Groove began一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Is that all for training? Then I'll be excusing myself.
choice_data_list: Where are you going in such a hurry?
Where are you going in such a hurry?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I don't think you have any right to ask, but fine. I'm going to go coach the juniors.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Students that haven't been scouted by a trainer are trained by instructors, but because the regimen is uniform it's difficult to give individual instruction.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: There are plenty that are troubled by this system. So I'm simply trying to guide them as best I can.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: There's no time. Well then, excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Huh…? You want to hold a meeting right now?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Not possible, I have cleaning plans with the student council. In the first place, I told you to tell me of any schedule changes a day in advance.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Send me a file of what it is you wanted to discuss. I'll look over it later.
Only a few days after signing the contract and I was already worrying over her busy schedule…
